title: Can I get a receipt or proof of donation?
content: Yes, after making a donation, you will receive an email confirmation that includes a receipt for your records.

title: Is my donation tax-deductible?
content: Donations to our organization are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.

title: Can I cancel a recurring donation?
content: Yes, you can cancel your recurring donation at any time by logging into your account and managing your donation settings.
